title: Stan Brakhage - Dog Star Man (1961-64, Dvd)
description:
Dog Star Man - Stan Brackhage
Regarded as his magnum opus, Stan BrakhageÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Dog Star Man is an ecstatic, mesmerising, arresting seventy five minute immersion in the sun, the stars, the earth. A fascinating visual poem, the film is a silent piece that cascades with solar flares, bursts of colour, artificial light and vibrant scratches across film. It is as far from a linear narrative as you could get and as such is very liberating. Maybe this is the most real kind of film you could find.
